ValidationRule.description: For Sales Opportunities, Must Populate Prospect Source Field to Mark Closed Won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name = "ReadyTalk Opportunity", $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), ISBLANK( TEXT( Prospect_Status__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Prospect Source is required for an opportunity to be marked as Closed Won.
